TrEd Extension: cac (version 1.24)

Czech Academic Corpus Annotation

(generated documentation)

Description:

Provides annotation mode for the Czech Academic Corpus project.

Installation

This extension can be installed directly from TrEd, using Setup >> Manage Extensions >> Get New Extensions; just make sure the repository http://ufal.mff.cuni.cz/~pajas/tred/extensions/ is enabled in Setup >> Manage Extensions >> Edit Repositories.

TrEd macro files:

  • cac/cac_treebank.mak
  • cac/contrib.mac
  • cac/PML_CAC_A_Edit.mak

Resource files:

  • adata_schema_cac.xml
  • mdata_schema_cac.xml
